home.description: A centralized database of various game assets

donate.title: Donate
donate.desc: wanderer.moe is ad-free and will always be free to use. If you enjoy the site and want to help with server costs, maintenance, and development, consider donating!

asset.nothingFoundSuggestions: If there's an asset you're looking for that you want added, fill out the asset request form!
asset.onMobile: If you're having issues downloading, read the FAQ by pressing the info symbol next to the game's name.

globalSearch.searchBar: Search for a game or asset...

faq.title: Întrebări frecvente
faq.purposeAnswer: wanderer.moe is a website that hosts a collection of assets from various games. The assets are organized by game and asset type. The sake of this website is to provide a centralized location for people to download assets from.
faq.downloadMultipleOrAll: Cum descarc multiple resurse sau toate fișierele?
faq.downloadMultipleOrAllAnswer: To download multiple assets, select the assets you want to download by clicking/tapping on them. Then click the 'Download Selected' button. To download all assets, click the 'Download All' button. This will save as a ZIP file in your Downloads folder.
faq.downloadOnMobileAnswer: Make sure that you are not viewing the website through social media applications and that you're using a dedicated browser. If you are on an iPhone, I recommend using Safari.
faq.howToExtract: How do I extract a ZIP file after downloading?
faq.howToExtractAnswer: If you are on Windows, you can use 7zip to extract the files. If you are on Mac, you can use the built in Archive Utility. If you are on iPhone, tap on the ZIP file, open the folder it creates, select the images and then tap 'Save to Photos'. If you are on Android, you can use a file manager app to extract the files.
faq.issueNotFound: I have an issue that isn't listed here!
faq.issueNotFoundAnswer: If you have an issue that isn't listed here, you can join the Discord server and ask for help there!

errors.refresh: Încearcă reîncărcarea paginii sau revino la pagina principală
errors.apiError: An error occurred while making a request to the API, try again or refresh the page.
